author: timbeiko
content:
Reminder, we have a 4844 breakout scheduled next week: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/586

There were a few issues standing the devnet up, but hopefully we can have it before/around the call. Since the last call, we've also had a lot of people reach out to contribute, so we can hopefully take time to discuss what tasks would be most helpful to get help with ðŸ™‚
